categories: Category:Missions of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Mission to Ryvester was a covert operation by Wraith Squadron in 13 ABY the planet of Ryvester, where Imperial Admiral Kosh Teradoc had a secret weapons lab. The Wraiths orchestrated a ruse that persuaded Teradoc to flee with a supposedly-valuable statue that was rigged with explosives. It detonated and the Wraiths stole Teradoc's yacht in their escape. They also rescued gemologist Mulus Cheems, who had "authenticated" the statue for Teradoc while covertly in the employ of the Wraiths.
